import React, { Component } from 'react'; import './Login.css'; const Login = (props) => { const [containerActive, setContainerActive] = React.useState(false); const signInButton = () => { console.log("false") setContainerActive(false); } const signUpButton = () => { console.log("true") setContainerActive(true); } return (
